description: This file defines a Flutter widget called NavDrawer, which creates a collapsible navigation drawer containing route shortcuts and user info, used in the gaming frontend application.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A simple data class representing an item in the navigation drawer, including its icon, label, and route.

methods.name: _items
methods.description: Returns a list of navigation items with associated icons, labels, and route names.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the navigation drawer, including user info, route shortcuts, and sign-out functionality.
